title: Aa Megami-sama - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted from Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Gods   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Older Love Interests
author: Touma Yumi
description: Keiichi Morisato was a typical college student, a failure with women, struggling to get through his classes, and in general living a pretty nondescript life. That is, until he dialed the wrong number and accidentally summoned the Norse goddess Belldandy. Not believing Belldandy was a goddess and that she could grant his every wish, Keiichi wished for her to stay with him forever. As they say: Be careful what you wish for! Now bound to Earth and at Keiichiâ€™s side for life, the lives of this most un-normal goddess and most lucky human will never be the same again.>
